# Run Scripts Prompts â€” Yarn v4 (Berry)

## Package Manager Rule

Always use **Yarn v4 (Berry)**.  
Never use **npm**, **npx**, or **pnpm** in this project.

## Allowed Commands (Yarn v4)

- `yarn add <pkg>`
- `yarn add -D <pkg>`
- `yarn install`
- `yarn <script>`

## Examples

```sh
yarn add react
yarn add -D typescript
yarn dev
```
